# Technology Stack

## Build System

This project uses **Projen** for project configuration and build management. All configuration is defined in `.projenrc.ts`.

**Important**: Do not manually edit generated files (marked with `~~ Generated by projen` comment). Instead, modify `.projenrc.ts` and run `npx projen` to regenerate.

## Core Technologies

- **AWS CDK** v2.166.0 - Infrastructure as Code
- **TypeScript** 5.6.3 - Primary language
- **Node.js** - Runtime environment
- **Docker** - Container image for Fargate service

## AWS Services

- Amazon API Gateway HTTP API
- AWS Fargate (ECS)
- Amazon VPC with isolated subnets
- VPC Endpoints (Interface & Gateway)
- AWS Cloud Map (Service Discovery)
- Amazon ECR (container registry)

## Development Tools

- ESLint - Linting with TypeScript support
- Prettier - Code formatting
- esbuild - Bundling
- ts-node - TypeScript execution

## Common Commands

```bash
# Build the project
npm run build

# Synthesize CloudFormation template
npm run synth

# Deploy to AWS
npm run deploy

# Destroy stack
npm run destroy

# Show diff against deployed stack
npm run diff

# Run linter
npm run eslint

# Watch mode for development
npm run watch

# Upgrade dependencies
npm run upgrade
```

## CDK Configuration

- Entry point: `src/main.ts`
- CDK app command: `npx ts-node -P tsconfig.json --prefer-ts-exts src/main.ts`
- Output directory: `cdk.out`
- New style stack synthesis enabled
